definition: "silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]

sentences.english: In fact, each of the road leading to the sun, are full of frustrations.
sentences.chinese: 缫其实每一条都通往阳光的大道，都充满坎坷。

sentences.english: I am a slow walker, but I never walk backwards.
sentences.chinese: 缫我走得很慢，但是我从来不会后退。

sentences.english: Malfunctions constitute the major factors affecting the productivity of automatic reeling machines.
sentences.chinese: 丝故障是影响自动缫生产能力的主要因素。

sentences.english: Time does not dye, Memories do not light.

sentences.chinese: 缫彪悍的人生不需要解释。

sentences.english: Knowlegde can change your fate and English can accomplish your future.
sentences.chinese: 缫知识改变命运，英语成就未来。

sentences.english: Love are treading on thin ice, but the pain ruyingsuixing.
sentences.chinese: 缫爱情如履薄冰，痛苦却如影随形。

sentences.english: You can't have a better tomorrow if you don't stop thinking about yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 缫如果你无法忘掉昨天，就不会有一个更好的明天。

sentences.english: In order to tackle the defect, it is necessary to improve automatic reeling process to get cocoon cooked compeletely.
sentences.chinese: 解决的办法是改进自缫煮茧工艺，使茧子适熟。

sentences.english: Life because of the pursuit of exciting, because of strong and beautiful life.
sentences.chinese: 缫人生因追求而精彩，生命因坚强而美丽。
